KADE maxArcade - USB/HID Joystick 4 Player (Beta)

pin Function
D00 Player 1 - D-Pad Up
D01 Player 1 - D-Pad Down
D02 Player 1 - D-Pad Left
D03 Player 1 - D-Pad Right
D04 Player 1 - Button 1
D05 Player 1 - Button 2
D06 Player 1 - Button 3
D07 Player 1 - Button 4
D08 Player 1 - Button 5
D09 Player 1 - Button 6
D10 Player 1 - Button 7
D11 Player 1 - Button 8
D12 *Unused
D13 Player 2 - D-Pad Up
D14 Player 2 - D-Pad Down
D15 Player 2 - D-Pad Left
D16 Player 2 - D-Pad Right
D17 Player 2 - Button 1
D18 Player 2 - Button 2
D19 Player 2 - Button 3
D20 Player 2 - Button 4
D21 Player 2 - Button 5
D22 Player 2 - Button 6
D23 Player 2 - Button 7
D24 Player 2 - Button 8
D25 Player 3 - D-Pad Up
D26 Player 3 - D-Pad Down
D27 Player 3 - D-Pad Left
D28 Player 3 - D-Pad Right
D29 Player 3 - Button 1
D30 Player 3 - Button 2
D31 Player 3 - Button 3
D32 Player 3 - Button 4
D33 Player 3 - Button 5
D34 Player 3 - Button 6
D35 Player 4 - D-Pad Up
D36 Player 4 - D-Pad Down
A00 Player 4 - D-Pad Left
A01 Player 4 - D-Pad Right
A02 Player 4 - Button 1
A03 Player 4 - Button 2
A04 Player 4 - Button 3
A05 Player 4 - Button 4
A06 Player 4 - Button 5
A07 Player 4 - Button 6
